doc.title: Adrenaline
doc.plot: This fast-paced suspense thriller revolves around Eric Price, an urbane business consultant of questionable character who becomes the target of a sophisticated and deadly embezzlement scheme. After an alluring temptress named Jasmine is killed in Eric's hotel room, he is caught up in a web of deception. Accused and on the run, Eric searches for evidence to clear his name, but each step causes his life to spiral wildly out of control. The police, FBI, and the killer close in just as Eric discovers the crucial piece of evidence. Now with his life hanging in the balance and time running out, Eric must decide who to trust in this complicated maze of deceit!
